macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Fails to Break $90K, Dips to $86.7K Before Rebounding to Around $88K
items.summary: Bitcoin traded between $87,435 and $90,406 over the past 24 hours but reversed early gains, dropping below $88,000 amid U.S. equities pullback and Nasdaq futures decline. Crypto Fear & Greed Index remains at 24, indicating Extreme Fear.

items.title: Uniswap Burns 100 Million UNI Tokens Worth $596 Million
items.summary: Uniswap successfully burned 100 million UNI tokens valued at approximately $596 million, a significant supply reduction event. UNI is among trending tokens amid market volatility.

items.title: Canton Network Releases CIP-56 Privacy Token Standard, CC Token Surges 22%
items.summary: Canton Network launched the CIP-56 privacy token standard, driving a 22% rise in CC token price. CC is highlighted as a top trending token.

items.title: U.S. Spot Bitcoin ETFs See $782 Million Net Outflows During Christmas Week
items.summary: U.S.-listed spot Bitcoin ETFs recorded cumulative net outflows of approximately $782 million during Christmas week. Investors are selling BTC to offset capital gains and reduce taxable income, per Bloomberg.

items.title: First Arrest in Coinbase Internal Data Leak Case
items.summary: Indian police arrested a former Coinbase customer service employee in connection with an internal data leak investigation. This marks the first arrest in the case.

items.title: ABN AMRO Receives MiCAR Approval, Launches Blockchain-Based Derivatives
items.summary: Dutch bank ABN AMRO obtained MiCAR approval and introduced blockchain-based derivatives. This regulatory milestone enables compliant crypto derivative offerings.

items.title: LayerZero Community Rejects Protocol Fee Mechanism Activation
items.summary: The LayerZero community vote to activate the protocol fee mechanism failed to pass. This decision impacts ZRO token dynamics amid ongoing developments.

items.title: Coinbase CEO: Bitcoin Acts as $38T Check on U.S. Debt and Inflation
items.summary: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong stated that Bitcoin strengthens the U.S. dollar by providing a $38 trillion check on debt and inflation. This view highlights BTC's macroeconomic role.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: MIT and Recursion Release Boltz-2 AI Model for Protein Structure and Binding Prediction
items.summary: Researchers at MIT's CSAIL and Recursion announced Boltz-2, an updated AI model that predicts protein structures and drug binding affinities in 20 seconds using a single GPU. The model is available under an MIT license for commercial and non-commercial use.

items.title: StepStellar Launches Step-DeepResearch, Cost-Effective 32B Parameter Deep Research Model
items.summary: Stepfun open-sourced Step-DeepResearch, a 32 billion parameter model for autonomous research and report generation, matching top commercial models like o3-mini at one-tenth the cost. It excels in benchmarks like Scale AI Research Rubrics (61.4%) and ADR-Bench.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Epic Games Store Reveals SKALD: Against the Black Priory as Free Game for December 28-29
items.summary: SKALD: Against the Black Priory has been officially unveiled as the Epic Games Store's free game available from December 28 to 29, 2025. This offers players a chance to claim the title at no cost during the specified period.

items.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 4 Movie Release Date Announced for March 19, 2027
items.summary: Paramount has set Sonic the Hedgehog 4 for theatrical release on March 19, 2027, with an additional event movie in the Sonic universe planned for December 22, 2028. The news was highlighted in Sonic community discussions.

items.title: Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny Receives PS5 Review Highlighting Nostalgia Value
items.summary: The isometric action RPG Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny, featuring characters like SpongeBob and TMNT, is praised for nostalgia but critiqued for lacking depth beyond its $49.99 price, available on PS5, Xbox, Switch, and PC. Review based on a provided copy.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Samsung Plans Google Photos Integration for AI TV Lineup
items.summary: Samsung announced plans to integrate Google Photos into its Samsung AI TV lineup, enabling users to relive memories on the big screen. This enhances smart TV features ahead of CES 2026 events.

items.title: CiDi Launches IPO Amid Autonomous Driving Commercial Expansion
items.summary: CiDi Inc. commenced its IPO process for a Hong Kong listing, highlighting scaled deployment of autonomous mining trucks and a dual-drive business model in V2X technology. The company has delivered 414 units and secured orders for 647 more as of June 2025.

items.title: Samsung and Apple Smartphone Prices May Continue Rising
items.summary: Reports indicate potential price increases for Samsung and Apple smartphones in the near future amid market trends. This follows discussions on next-generation devices like iPhone Air for 2026.
